Name: Golden Wave
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: BLEND all ingredients with a 6oz scoop of crushed ice and serve with straws.
Review: Rum-laced fruit served long and cold with crushed ice.
History: A tropical-style cocktail created in 1969 by Jose "Joe" Yatco at China Trader in California, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Golden Wave contains 161 calories
